title: Problem Solving thread, gimme your problem , i give you a solution
body:
ANY problem , you hear me ? any.
even rioter can ask,
the ones working on tech .... not the one working on concept...
who pays for concept anyways ?

yeah , after ask riot , you now have ask anivia.

Anivia always go the answer :D

replies.body: I told my friend "You suck at league!" and his response was "Your mom gay". How do i respond to that lvl of destruction.

Tell him "as inconsequential as your word are, i would highly advise you to study a little more so you understand the basics of every word composing your sentence, and understanding that , among the english standards, none forbid me to compose an ultimate poetical symphony of an enallage : no u"

or simply finish his job yourself and tell him : "i didn't choose my mom"
My problem is that I am having trouble estimating the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow. Please help.

I had no idea so i used my friend Python to help me :
https://imgur.com/gWJW4tS

don't thank me , thanks him ;)
My problem is not having enough walls to build across rift. Please help

It's because of ornn
ban him in every game and he should stop breaking your walls

Also also, dating: tips for a shy guy

1: dating technique,
use the bird technique , learn to dance, you'll immediately see the result , with a clear answer.
if she says no , it mean she doesn't deserve you after all your effort.

be REAAAAAALLY honest , at worst , she'll think you're a weindo , but if that is how you are , in the first place , it's better for you ;)

2:
AP bruisers are WAAAY harder to define than ad bruisers.
why ?
because ap champ tend to have a LOT more defensive tool , and always a mix of two,
meaning that a lot of champion with a simple shield can become an ap bruiser (looking at you ekko)
some other champion are given ap ratio but never actually take ap , this give theml a lot of potential to become an ap bruiser (thinking about you alistar)

some champion have almost only ap ration and are still played ad
(thinking about you skarner)

unlike ad bruisers, where almost every bruiser use the same item ({{item:3053}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3748}} ), 
the ap itemization can make a bruiser out of you far easier({{champion:34}} + voracious hunter + {{item:3065}} )

i think it should be split into  many more categories :

high damages, a few utility + defensive tools (the actual bruisers, like vlad)
medium damages (a lot of it is really split onto spells)+ medium defensive tools + utility (AP juggernaut, like gragas)
little damages , a ton of utility (alistar)

and you should analyze each of these category , make sure you dont mix them up.

edit :
title = "It's Not About AP bruisers, it's about something Forgotten"

> high damages, a few utility + defensive tools (the actual bruisers, like vlad)
> medium damages (a lot of it is really split onto spells)+ medium defensive tools + utility (AP juggernaut, like gragas)
> little damages , a ton of utility (alistar)
> 
> and you should analyze each of these category , make sure you dont mix them up.

Thank you so very much :)    I might do a few more articles to address the other groups, and make it a series.  First one about the successful ones right now (Vlad, lisandra, etc) which have high damage.  Second the fighters and Juggernauts (article you read), and finally the high utility ones: Alistar and company.

I’t could be fun to also use the successful cases as a point and point out the differences between them and the failed ones. Will have to draft it some more.  Thank you {{sticker:vlad-salute}}

OH GREAT LORD ANIVIA!

Morello is not working in Riot anymore.
We need him back so he can keep CertainlyT's toxic imagination in check, and others too.

he sure know one or two things about spanking designer's imagination
Problem solved ;)

Me: Yo CT! Be our Morello and keep designers in check!
CT: Okay sure! I'll be sure that if there is anything "healthy" or with "counterplay" doesn't make it in live servers!

Yeah, no. In all seriousness now.
The dude looks likes a younger alternate version of Robin Williams, who joined riot thinking LoL is a PvE game and not a PvP.
I got nothing against CertainlyT, but he needs to have limits and to ask himself "should i stop? I think this is too much now." every once in a while. Maybe even every 5 minutes.

what i'm gonna say is a heresy but i think he contributed a lot to lol , thanks to his work we have a lot of new system , no one would have ever thought before.
doesn't mean he is good , it mean he pushed the limits a little further every time.

not always the best for the player , but in general for gaming, he remains as a cursed relics, a double edge swords that everyone is gonna remember somehow

CertainlyT may not be a bad designer, but he needs to have limits and have someone to keep an eye on him and other designers.
Personally, i'm convinced that he never takes the playerbase into account and goes to his own accord. He's like that kid who is like "i want a hero who can counter his own counter!"

I mean, to top it off, I don't know if he plays League, but what i know is he doesn't even like playing vs his own champions. Like seriously? Who even does that? You made it, you should know how to counter it.

1 I need .Net Developers for my client in Los Angeles, CA. Experience with API, ASP.Net, banking experience preferred. anyway you could help with this?

2 how do we get riot to either make Leblanc into a viable champion or delete her completely?

1) if it's about me getting involved, i could technically help , but living at the other side of the planet wouldn't help ;)
otherwise , to help you find skilled people i have a good new for you,
The thing is depending on the salary , a lot of variation in the appeal of that offer,
i would need more detail but i'm always up to help ;)


2) We have to use the only tools at our disposal :

* Spam lol reddit (not effective)
* Spam the forum (not very effective)
* Spam their customer service (lmao, don't actually do that)
* Create a petition.
* Use the mob's intelligence to create a spellset that it healthy and viable (pyke for instance is both)
* Stop buying skin massively and promising to buy one if they listen to us
* DDos their coffee machine
* Create a gameplay+ thread that is gonna be certainly seen by people.
That last bullet I am not CERTAINLYT I want it seen by someone. lol I just wanted to see how you would answer Thanks Anivia.
im also an anivia OTP and my problem is that anivia is not popular enough

That's because you don't play her enough ,if you did , player would see how amazing this champion is :D

anyway , everyone not playing anivia is WRONG
Anivia keeps fisting me in botlane. I can't survive much longer
2 words mobi boots

I want a cute Asian girlfriend that will play video games with me and is good at them. I want to be a professional gamer. I want friends that play monster hunter. I want to not be afraid of getting a job. I want to not feel so tired all the time. I want competitive pokemon to not be filled with so many hacked pokemon. I want people to not look at me weird when I don't want to talk to anyone. I want Espeon GX randomly from a booster pack. I want a Paper Mario game that goes back to the way the first two game were. I want doctors to have a way to check my blood without sticking a needle in me and making me almost pass out.

There's more but who really cares right?

Answering each of these problems :
1- it's already fairly rare to find women in the gaming community,
gamers tends to be very misogynistic
and it's sad that talented women being popular is rare :(
how ever , you can always get a person to play with you videogame , the thing is , don't throw them in LOL right off the batch,
start slowly with open games (like a mario party game)
Once the person is used to being playful you can finally get her to play Rpg , from that point , you're almost good to go.
but anyway , choosing specifically an "asian" person is harder than it seems,
you may want to learn that culture first , after that, if you start discovering an asian culture , finding love might not be as hard as you imagine,
there tends to be a lot of misogyny in a lot of asian culture,
prove that you know better then that, and as sad as what i'm going to say is,
you'll top a big percentage of other asian people.

2- Technically , there are a lot of kind of professional gamer, but here i my question to you , what KIND of professional gamer do you expect to be ?
you can become a beta tester, there is even PBE for that , go hunt down bugs, and learn on how to make a report ;)
you can become a streamer, there , your image will be the hardest to manage, getting new people to like you content mean that you are able to give them something they don't have
you can become an E-sport player, there, you are gonna need a coach , or a lot of time.
just to give you a small look on what kind of document you have to get used to : https://imgur.com/BTv3bsA
among that , hours of training are needed , but if you really want it hard , i truly believe you can become an E-sport Pro,
however , it's not gonna be simple.

3- I do play monster hunter world , i actually shove the game , if you want to meet around i'll be glad to drop a name so we can play.

4- Something that is a misconception about jobs is that jobs are annoying, i don't think so, i'm someone that , for a "game" he created himself would stay awake at 3:36 am to answer someone in the forum and guide him through his hard times and questions.
You see , everything can be a game, even programming , as long a you understand what is the purpose of what you are doing, anything can be a game https://imgur.com/z2wt93f
that thing took me like 30 hours , and a bunch of math problem solving to figure out , i did that for a friend , and it's not even finished.
but i had a LOT of fun doing it, and i BET i can be paid for doing that very thing.
Find a job you like , and  you'll never have to work ;)

5- technically , Being tired is just a signal , it's like being hungry , if you eat too much too often you might not be able to know when you are hungry.
being, you can overcome that problem if you start battling it the good way , start by waking up earlier and sleeping sooner , and use the extra time you get each morning to meditate (sit , don't sleep)
by slowly getting yourself in mood you will stop feeling tired if you make sure you sleep the correct amount
you can try taking a little nap in the middle of the days to get back on track when needed.
slowly but surely you will stop feeling tired at all.

6-As a Pokemon player myself i know that,
even Nintendo know that , but you know , that's why they simplified iv distribution
getting a specific 30 iv Pokemon is dang hard.
people will always  cheat to get those , but get your hand on every 31iv pokemon + DW ability so you can always make any poikemon you need , 
this is LONG and Tideous , but dont hesitate to ask trades with people , you'll get there in the end ;)
in the end , a legit Pokemon winning always feel good , and cheaters can't go far, even you know that.

7-Stand your ground , a person might want to be alone for a moment , usually , lack of confidence just make that worse,
you have to be subtle, if you show you don't want to be alone because people force you too , but because you actually enjoy it , show it proudly,
there no reason for someone to mock you for reaching an internal peace, or disturb you.
people want sometimes to help you when you feel alone , that's the reason why they look at you , we are social animal , some don't understand how we can desire to be alone.
usually those people have problem thinking for themselves.

8- Yeah i have bad news , the only solution to this is : get a job , buy booster packs LMAO;
or you can steal them , but i'm not sure it's very .... legal...

9- Nintendo has problems with sequels, they don't occur often,
that's their policy , that's why it's almost impossible for them to stick two games together.
HOWEVER,
there is something you can do if you really wan't that game to exist :
MAKE IT YOURSELF BUDDY !!!
don't hesitate, if you want it THAT bad , no one is gonna serve you better than yourself.

10- Trypanophobia is a quite common phobia,
usually , people don't realise how they can think of the human body.
this phobia is usually hard to approach since it's quite hard to know where it comes from,
 i think you take the problem from the wrong side.
you whole body is like and immense sponge, your skin is porous and covered with an acid layer making you feel like it's completely smooth.
a needle inside your body usually is like a needle trough a sponge , it's just a slightly bigger hole than the one existing (like putting a pin on a shirt)
i'm not an psychiatrist but i overcame my apiphobia so i can surely tell you that meditating and calm helps a lot against phobia.
people will always need your blood to test and you blood is inside your body , sorry bud , but to test it , i'm not sure there is EVER gonna be another way than  puncturing a hole to access your bloodsystem

Meh...

That monster hunter offer is tempting though...

Come on guy , you don't even have homework or something ? i'm in high demand for problem solving , i had too much code in the last few days , i miss my usual problem solving !
1k view and all of those people don't have problems ?

no challenge resist me !
Why do I suck so much at video games?

It depends on what kind of video games you play,
there can be several reason,

1: you might lack the mechanical skill,
you see, we have two ways of dealing with a problem (if you cut down)
* a quick and fast paced way where you use biased decision that you learnt over the course of your training
* a long way where you think about every detail

usually , games use one or both of these system

the first one is the system you tend to have in games like FPS where mechanical skill is present a LOT.
there in no secret in these kind of games, you have to strain yourself , like learning piano at using every micro play technique possible
Osu is the perfect example of a game relying on that specifically

the second one is a little  different , it uses logic to create deph.
therefore , to progress you will need a clear understanding of the game functionning

Here are a few example:
*Positioning strategy : Chess, the game uses the position to dictate the strategy, or tower defense games
*Statistical strategy : Any Rpg, you need to understand the math behind the scene to work with it
*Prediction strategy : recognizing patterns in opponent's movement, i guess stocks market trade is specifically about that if you call that a game

any of the game you play use a combination of these things to create a game,

the more of there complexity you add to a game , the harder it becomes

lol uses these 4, and they represent the 4 aspect of the  complexity you can add to a game.
every of these aspect contribute equally to victory.

i suggest , if you can't think of a clear reason why you suck , to first try to see what aspect of the game you plays you find the most commonly in them and work on that
i dont have any problems, plz help

not having a problem is a problem on its own , it mean you have no objective to overcome and therefore no way to progress.
see, it's after loosing something that you realize how important it was,
due to the philosophical problem that is subjective view of a problem.
anyone seing now problem in his life cannot get better , because he cannot see how hard it was.

therefore if you have not problem , i'm going to give you one :
"how do you make sure that a waffle is perfectly baked in vaccum ?"
the solution might help humanity to achieve a great step forward : being able to make porous waffle in space.

I thought of a new problem in the last 28 minutes

I can't use Burton 4-mallet grip on the vibraphone if I want to join the Columbians drum corps. I would need to learn Stevens grip.

yeah Stephen grip sound amazing for chords , you don't have choice anyway ,
no one really plays vibraphone specifically for jazzy sounds,

in general you will want to use vibraphone for embellishment , and Steven's grip does that wonderfully right ;)
i need volibear buffs pronto

You see , many would think volibear need buff , but it's the other way around , everyone deserve nerf except volibear, the game should be centered around him,
especially his ap build  that is the most fair thing in the universe !
My problem is my parents made a huge mistake 20 years ago

the thing is , many of us would thing we are garbage sometimes , worthless, we have no ambition , no way to go, nothing to do.

however , let me tell you something , that's not true,
if you see a man and tell him he is worthless, you have missed a lot of thing in your life,

you won't always think that things are going right , but you can always contribute, any contribution to the world you do remains,
you have to go as far as possible to see that there is so much more to cover
It's like thinking "nature was wrong when doing ..."
that's the huge difference, somehow, you are useful to someone in the world,
trust me , you're not the only one , and i truly think that.

if you seek a meaning to your action you wont find any until you give them one.

The most insignificant thing can have major impact on your life , for the good and the bad.

you're not a mistake , it's you who decides that, 
you have knowledge in front of you , thing you can do,
only many decade after you rest in peace may the world tell you if you were a mistake , 
every great man thought that at some point in his life,

and trust me , if you decide to not be a mistake , you'll end up be a firework ;)
you have time , don't stress out {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
